content.title: Customizing Layers
content.subtitle: Change visualization styles and enable grid-based analysis for deeper insights.
description: SEAk allows you to customize how layers are displayed, from simple styling options to advanced grid-based analysis. This improves both visualization and data interpretation.
Click the three-dot menu (More Options) next to a layer and select 'Style'.
- Stroke: Adjust the color of polygon boundaries.
- Fill: Adjust the color inside polygons.
Use the color picker and opacity slider to set your preferences, then click 'Apply' and 'Submit'.
Updated styles instantly appear on the map and in infographics.
From the same Style menu, select 'Grid'.
Use the '+' or 'â€“' buttons to define grid size, then click 'Create Grid'.
The map will divide into grids.
Click on any grid cell to view detailed analytics, including class distribution, infographics, and metrics specific to that location.
